banner.heading: The Foundation Course On Indian Stock Market 2.0
banner.text: (Learn to find the right stocks after 1st lecture)

course.headings: How To Start Investing With Rs. 10,000?
How To Pick the Right Stock?
How To Make Your Own Stocks Portfolio?

syllabus.title: SME & Mainboard IPO (Advanced Strategies for Beginners)
syllabus.subtitle: Learn how to select winning IPOs. IPOs which can be profitable for you and also how people get allotment in popular SME and mainboard IPOs.

syllabus.title: Top Down and Bottom Up Industry Analysis
syllabus.subtitle: Find the potential of any industry and see if it is sunset or sunrise. You will be able to decide if this industry is right for investment or not.
syllabus.alt: Understand how to grow your initial investment

syllabus.title: Behavioral & Psychological Finance in Share Market
syllabus.subtitle: Know how people are influenced by their behavior and how can you use that to make profit in the market

syllabus.title: How Does F&O Really Work?
syllabus.subtitle: Future & options don’t work for everyone, because people don’t know how to use them to take best out of them. We will tell you how exactly F&O works in reality.

syllabus.title: Trading vs Investing: Where Is Real Money?
syllabus.subtitle: Learn how to take profit from trading vs investing. Know where you can make real money and much more.

syllabus.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 1
syllabus.subtitle: At the start, we always think that every second stock we find is an excellent opportunity, or some of us realise that we have been missing many opportunities, and both things are not valid. In this section, we start with the basics of investing your first money.

syllabus.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 2
syllabus.subtitle: This section is like a handheld support to help you invest your first 10K.
syllabus.alt: Understand how to grow your initial investment

syllabus.title: How to Invest in Your First Winning IPO
syllabus.subtitle: Investing in an IPO for listing gain and holding the share for the long term are two different things, and this section deals with both. After this section, you will be able to find such IPOs that give you quick wins in the form of listing gain or can give you a stock to hold on to.

syllabus.title: 5 Tools to Pick Winning Stocks Faster
syllabus.subtitle: Here you will learn to do basic financial analysis and ratios to pick fundamentally good stocks for your portfolio which can outperform the index in the long term.

syllabus.title: Penny Stock ki Duniya
syllabus.subtitle: How can you find a penny that can be a titan for you?

syllabus.title: Avoid These 3 Mistakes to Save Lakhs
syllabus.subtitle: It is essential to know what to do in the stock market, but it is more important to know what NOT to do in the stock market.

syllabus.title: Psychology of Making Money
syllabus.subtitle: Making is not an art, nor is it a science. It is a craft. A craft that can be perfected with the right tools, technique, mindset and more. And this section will talk about that.

syllabus.title: Saving Your Stock Taxes
syllabus.subtitle: Do you want to give away your profits from the stock market to anyone? I hope not. This section will talk about the best way to save your capital gain taxes.

user_testimonials.name: Mustafa Mirza
user_testimonials.comment: मैं एक PSI हूँ, मैने Stocks पर जो भी सिखा हू उसका श्रेय प्रसाद सर को जाता है, और मैने उनका कोर्स देखा है! और इस कोर्स से मै जो चिजे सिखा हू शायदही वह मुझे कही और सिखने मिलती!

user_testimonials.name: Soniya Pilley
user_testimonials.comment: Prasad Sir is too good. Never thought that I could understand the Indian stock Market so well. The stock market was difficult, but Prasad sir made it learnable.

user_testimonials.name: Kamal Kishore Tiwadih
user_testimonials.comment: I started investing ₹5,000 in shares with the help of the course. Today, I've invested ₹40,000, and my portfolio total amount is ₹84,000. This is due to Prasad sir's Course.

user_testimonials.name: Gaurav Kashyap
user_testimonials.comment: I have followed Prasad Sir since 2020. When I learned about his course on the stock market, I was the fastest mover to enroll in the course. I got all answers to my queries.

user_testimonials.name: Ganesh vhatkar
user_testimonials.comment: It was very informative and more than value for money. Yet few more sector analysis are needed

pricing.comboText1: The Foundation Course On Indian Stock Market 2.O

candidate.courseTxt: Those who want to start their investment journey independently

faq.question: How this course is different from The Complete Course On Fundamental Analysis?
faq.answer: This course deals with basic practical applications in the stock market, which is very useful for a beginner whereas the Fundamental Analysis course deals with more advanced applications and investment tools. If you are new to the stock market this course would be a better choice for you.

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or in English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
faq.answer: It is a pre-recorded course with access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
How to access this course after payment?
faq.answer: After payment you will get a login link and credential on your whatsapp number and mail. There you can access your course.

faq.question: Is this course focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is mainly focused on medium to long term investors.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the course?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access.

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice with this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice.

faq.question: Can I get a refund, if I don’t like the course?
faq.answer: Yes, you can opt for a full refund anytime within 5 days of purchase. To request a refund just write a mail to support@finnovationz.com

faq.question: Does this course include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: This course is designed for investors and not for traders, hence it doesn't need technical analysis.

faq.question: What skills are needed to start this course?
faq.answer: You just need to know maths till 5th grade with good observation skills.
